item.title: Pope Francis Will Miss Mass on Sunday Because of Poor Health
item.description: The Vatican said the pontiff, who is in the hospital with a “respiratory tract infection,” was resting and had eaten breakfast and read newspapers “as...

item.title: Europe, Dazed by Trump, Confronts Hard Choices in Ukraine
item.description: Faced with undisguised hostility from the Trump administration, Europeans are preparing for what is shaping up to be a go-it-alone era.

item.title: Senior U.S. and Russian Officials Meet for Extensive Talks in Riyadh
item.description: The two sides were expected to discuss ways to end the war in Ukraine and restore relations between the U.S. and Russia. The meeting came less than a ...

item.title: U.S.-Russia Talks in Saudi Arabia Set to Go Beyond Ukraine
item.description: The two sides are meeting in Saudi Arabia for their most extensive discussions in years. In addition to Ukraine, business ties are on the table.

item.title: Korean Victim of WWII Sex Slavery Who Fought for Japan’s Apology Dies
item.description: She led a tireless campaign for a formal apology and reparations from Japan for what it did to thousands of women like her — mostly Korean — during Wo...
